summary:
Replace the undead(skeleton) sounds.
It's very immersive when you're play a horror quest mod or be a mighty necromancer.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#6fa8dc]　
　
[size=4]Description[/size][/color][/b]
Replace the undead(skeleton) sounds.
It's very immersive when you're play a horror quest mod or be a mighty necromancer.

[youtube]Y8CQ93n6EIg[/youtube]

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]
None.

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
Use any kind of mod manager ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]). Or just unzip it and place the sound folder into your Data folder.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/color][/b]
This mod is fully compatible with any creature/monster mod that use the undead combat, idle, or injured 
sounds. Such as skeleton, draugr, ghost, undead, reanimated corpse, zombie...etc (exclude voiced npc).

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]Change log[/b][/size][/color]
0.2 Initial release
12 sound files. Different types of scream and howling sounds. Including conscious(idle) sounds.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Examples
[/size][/color][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48467/?]Beyond Reach[/url] with this mod
[youtube]_P2tNRkiTzg[/youtube]



Any comments or suggestion are welcome.
English isn't my native language,  so please excuse any mistakes.
author: dwing9999
